CustomField.formula:
IF (AND(Behavior_Heat_Rating__c < 20, Status__c = "Customer"),20,
IF (AND (Behavior_Heat_Rating__c < 20, Count_of_Lost_Opps__c + Count_of_Won_Opps__c < Count_of_Opps__c),20,
IF
(AND(Behavior_Heat_Rating__c < 10, Count_of_Opps__c > 0),10,
IF
(AND(Behavior_Heat_Rating__c < 10, Opt_In_Leads_Contacts__c > 0),10,
IF (Behavior_Heat_Rating__c > 30,30,
Behavior_Heat_Rating__c)))))
CustomField.label: Account Behavior Rating
